short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whales, the most powerful and delicate creatures on Earth, on your new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download this new tab extension to enjoy new background images of  majestic whales swimming in the wild ocean.

Enhance your browsing experience with a customized web search page, with beautiful background images.

The new tab overrides the Search bar functionality. It will not make any changes to other search settings in your browser. 

By installing Blue Spice extension you agree to the Terms of service and the Privacy Policy, as described on our website

All images on the website and extension are royalty free.
